roleset.name: convert to or treat with nitric acid/nitrogen
roleset.note: NITRIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nitrify' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VN. VerbNet entry 45.4. (from nitrify.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: Descriptive usage
example.text: The organic input can also provide the genesis for the nitrifying bacteria.
